General risk warning: The site is an online trading platform for derivative financial instruments. Trading in derivative financial instruments brings a high level of investment income, but is also associated with the possibility of losing your investment.

Before you start trading, you must qualify your own trading tasks, assess the degree of your own preparation, and also carefully weigh your money and risk management. Please read carefully the general trading criteria presented on our website before making any of your investments. Before making a decision on the beginning of transactions with financial instruments on this website, you must familiarize yourself with the Terms and Conditions of Service, as well as with the Notification of risks, Refund Policy, Privacy Policy and AML and KYC Policy.
